original: @335a * // nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bzhugs//
analyzed: @335a * // nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bzhugs//
translated: The One Hundred and Eight Names of Vasudharā

original: # // 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // 'phags ma nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Vasudharā!

original: gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes mchog ster ma //
analyzed: gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes mchog ster ma //
translated: You are the bestower of the supreme beautiful form,

original: nor 'dzin byed ma nor rgyun ma //
analyzed: nor 'dzin byed ma nor rgyun ma //
translated: The holder of wealth, the stream of wealth,

original: nor dpal dpal mdzad mchog gyur ma //
analyzed: nor dpal dpal mdzad mchog gyur ma //
translated: The glory of wealth, the creator of glory, the supreme one,

original: 'dzin ma 'dzin byed skyong byed ma //
analyzed: 'dzin ma 'dzin byed skyong byed ma //
translated: The holder, the holder of wealth, the protector,

original: skyabs gyur gus la mnyes gshin pa //
analyzed: skyabs gyur gus la mnyes gshin pa //
translated: The refuge, the one who delights in devotion,

original: lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin //
analyzed: lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin //
translated: The goddess of the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma //
analyzed: shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma //
translated: The glory of wisdom, the increaser of intellect,

original: rig 'dzin zhi ba phra mo ste //
analyzed: rig 'dzin zhi ba phra mo ste //
translated: The vidyādhara, the peaceful, the subtle one,

original: zhi ba kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma //
analyzed: zhi ba kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma //
translated: The peaceful, the all-pervading, the follower,

original: sgrol ma sgrol 'jug lha mo ste //
analyzed: sgrol ma sgrol 'jug lha mo ste //
translated: The goddess Tārā, the one who liberates and engages,

original: rigs sbyin dbang phyug dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: rigs sbyin dbang phyug dbang phyug ma //
translated: The bestower of families, the powerful, the powerful one,

original: rgyan ma 'byung po'i yum gyur ma //
analyzed: rgyan ma 'byung po'i yum gyur ma //
translated: The ornament, the mother of spirits,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byed ma //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byed ma //
translated: The one who adorns with all ornaments,

original: gdul dka' sgrub mdzad 'jigs byed ma //
analyzed: gdul dka' sgrub mdzad 'jigs byed ma //
translated: The one who accomplishes the difficult to tame, the terrifying one,

original: drag mo drag po mchog tu gnon //
analyzed: drag mo drag po mchog tu gnon //
translated: The fierce one, the supreme conqueror of the fierce,

original: lha mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
analyzed: lha mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin //
translated: The goddess who has gone to the other side of generosity,

original: char 'bebs @335b bzang po'i gzugs can ma //
analyzed: char 'bebs @335b bzang po'i gzugs can ma //
translated: She is the one who has the form of a good rain-maker.🔽She is the one who creates all the treasures, good fortune,

original: gter dang bkra shis thams cad dang // grags dang dpal dang snyan mdzad dge //
analyzed: gter dang bkra shis thams cad dang // grags dang dpal dang snyan mdzad dge //
translated: fame, glory, and renown.🔽She is the one who slays the Rākṣasas,

original: sreg ma gsod ma gtum mo ste //🔽'tshe byed ma mo thams cad ma //
analyzed: sreg ma gsod ma gtum mo ste // 'tshe byed ma mo thams cad ma //
translated: the one who is fierce,🔽the one who terrifies Yama,

original: gshin rje skrag mdzad drag nyid ma //
analyzed: gshin rje skrag mdzad drag nyid ma //
translated: the one who is fierce,

original: gzhon nu ma dang sna tshogs gzugs//
analyzed: gzhon nu ma dang sna tshogs gzugs//
translated: the one who is a virgin, the one who has various forms,

original: lha mo brtson 'grus pha rol phyin //
analyzed: lha mo brtson 'grus pha rol phyin //
translated: the one who is the perfection of effort,

original: 'gro ba dga' mdzad can ma ste //
analyzed: 'gro ba dga' mdzad can ma ste //
translated: the one who delights beings,

original: dka' thub ma dang drag gzugs ma //
analyzed: dka' thub ma dang drag gzugs ma //
translated: the one who is an ascetic, the one who has a fierce form,

original: rdzu 'phrul grub pa mchog ster ma //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul grub pa mchog ster ma //
translated: the one who grants the supreme accomplishment of magical power,

original: skal bzang bsod nams skal ba che //
analyzed: skal bzang bsod nams skal ba che //
translated: the one who has good fortune, the one who has great merit,

original: mi thub thub pa pha rol gnon //
analyzed: mi thub thub pa pha rol gnon //
translated: the one who is invincible, the one who conquers the enemy,

original: 'gro la gcig tu phan brtson ma //
analyzed: 'gro la gcig tu phan brtson ma //
translated: the one who strives for the benefit of beings,

original: g-yul las sgrol byed dge ba mo //
analyzed: g-yul las sgrol byed dge ba mo //
translated: the one who is virtuous, the one who liberates from battle,

original: lha mo bzod pa'i pha rol phyin //
analyzed: lha mo bzod pa'i pha rol phyin //
translated: the one who is the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims bsam gtan sgom mdzad ma //
analyzed: tshul khrims bsam gtan sgom mdzad ma //
translated: the one who meditates on morality and concentration,

original: padma can dang padma 'dzin //
analyzed: padma can dang padma 'dzin //
translated: the one who is the lotus, the one who holds the lotus,

original: padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa mo //
analyzed: padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa mo //
translated: the one who sits on a lotus seat,

original: dag pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid che //
analyzed: dag pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid che //
translated: the one who has a pure form, the one who has great splendor,

original: gser gyi mdog can 'od mdzad ma //
analyzed: gser gyi mdog can 'od mdzad ma //
translated: The goddess who is golden-colored and radiant,

original: yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin lha mo //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin lha mo //
translated: The goddess who holds a wish-fulfilling gem,

original: shes rab glegs bam 'dzin pa mo //
analyzed: shes rab glegs bam 'dzin pa mo //
translated: The goddess who holds a book of wisdom,

original: gter gyi phung por bzhugs mdzad ma //
analyzed: gter gyi phung por bzhugs mdzad ma //
translated: The goddess who resides in a heap of treasure,

original: nor dang ldan mdzad nor dga' ma //
analyzed: nor dang ldan mdzad nor dga' ma //
translated: The goddess who bestows wealth and delights in wealth,

original: khams gsum dbang phyug chen mo ste //
analyzed: khams gsum dbang phyug chen mo ste //
translated: The great lady who rules over the three realms,

original: lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo //
analyzed: lha yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa mo //
translated: The goddess who is adorned with divine ornaments,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyur ma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi yum gyur ma //
translated: The mother of all the buddhas,

original: rin chen khams kyi dbang phyug ma //
analyzed: rin chen khams kyi dbang phyug ma //
translated: The lady who rules over the precious realm,

original: dngos po stong nyid bsgom lha mo //
analyzed: dngos po stong nyid bsgom lha mo //
translated: The goddess who meditates on the emptiness of things,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam spang mo //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam spang mo //
translated: The goddess who is free from both existence and nonexistence,

original: gdul bar bya ba 'dul mdzad ma //
analyzed: gdul bar bya ba 'dul mdzad ma //
translated: The goddess who tames those to be tamed,

original: sgrol ma nyon mongs spyod pa mo //
analyzed: sgrol ma nyon mongs spyod pa mo //
translated: The goddess who liberates and engages in afflictions,

original: bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo //
analyzed: bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo //
translated: The goddess who conquers all demons,

original: sa 'og bdun po skyong mdzad ma //
analyzed: sa 'og bdun po skyong mdzad ma //
translated: The goddess who protects the seven underworld realms,

original: bram ze ma da dmigs byed yum //
analyzed: bram ze ma da dmigs byed yum //
translated: The mother of the Brahmin and the one who observes the world,

original: sbas ma phug tu gnas pa mo //🔽dbyangs can ma dang spyan yangs ma //
analyzed: sbas ma phug tu gnas pa mo // dbyangs can ma dang spyan yangs ma //
translated: The goddess who resides in hidden caves,🔽The goddess Sarasvatī with her wide eyes,

original: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan pa mo //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi ldan pa mo //
translated: The goddess who possesses the four abodes of Brahmā,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen ma //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen ma //
translated: The goddess who delights the tathāgatas,

original: rdo rje can ma rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: rdo rje can ma rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Vajrinī, Vajradhara,

original: las 'dzin 'jug cing las 'dzin ma //
analyzed: las 'dzin 'jug cing las 'dzin ma //
translated: Seizer of karma, engaging in karma, seizer of karma,

original: sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs 'bar //
analyzed: sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs 'bar //
translated: Śiva of variety, blazing with variety,

original: sprin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa mo //
analyzed: sprin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa mo //
translated: Possessing a cloud maṇḍala,

original: sems can kun gyis rtogs mdzad ma //
analyzed: sems can kun gyis rtogs mdzad ma //
translated: Causing all sentient beings to realize,

original: byang chub yang dag thob mdzad ma //
analyzed: byang chub yang dag thob mdzad ma //
translated: Causing the attainment of enlightenment,

original: bsam gtan mos pa phun tshogs ma //
analyzed: bsam gtan mos pa phun tshogs ma //
translated: Perfect in concentration and interest,

original: gnyis med gnyis med sgom mdzad ma //🔽don kun @336a * //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis med sgom mdzad ma // don kun @336a * //
translated: Meditating on nonduality, nondual,

original: sgrub mdzad bzang mo ste //
analyzed: sgrub mdzad bzang mo ste //
translated: Accomplishing all aims, good,

original: bud med gzugs can dkar mo gnon //
analyzed: bud med gzugs can dkar mo gnon //
translated: Stepping on a white woman-formed one,

original: sangs rgyas las rnams ston mdzad ma //
analyzed: sangs rgyas las rnams ston mdzad ma //
translated: Demonstrating the activities of the buddhas,

original: ngag gi dbang mo ston ma che //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang mo ston ma che //
translated: Great teacher of the goddess of speech,

original: srung mdzad 'dzin mdzod nor ster ma //
analyzed: srung mdzad 'dzin mdzod nor ster ma //
translated: Protecting, holding, and bestowing wealth,

original: bud med gzugs 'dzin grub pa mo //
analyzed: bud med gzugs 'dzin grub pa mo //
translated: Accomplished one, holding a woman’s form,

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Yoginī, lord of yogins,

original: yid 'phrog ma dang gzugs mdzes ma //
analyzed: yid 'phrog ma dang gzugs mdzes ma //
translated: Enchanting, beautiful,

original: skal bzang dga' ba ston pa mo //
analyzed: skal bzang dga' ba ston pa mo //
translated: Demonstrating the joy of good fortune,

original: ded dpon ma dang brtse ldan ma //
analyzed: ded dpon ma dang brtse ldan ma //
translated: Leader, compassionate,

original: de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid ma //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid ma //
translated: Nature of all tathāgatas,

original: nor rgyun lha mo khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: nor rgyun lha mo khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, goddess Vasudharā.

original: sems can kun gyi don ster ma //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don ster ma //
translated: You who bestow the benefit of all beings,

original: bzang po'i gzugs can khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: bzang po'i gzugs can khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, O you who have a beautiful form.

original: nor rgyun ma khyod la phyag 'tshal //🔽mtshan ni brgyad lhag brgya pa ni //
analyzed: nor rgyun ma khyod la phyag 'tshal // mtshan ni brgyad lhag brgya pa ni //
translated: I pay homage to you, Vasudharā.🔽Whoever recites the one with one hundred and eight names

original: gang zhig dus gsum klog byed pa //
analyzed: gang zhig dus gsum klog byed pa //
translated: in the three times,

original: yid kyi shing rtas 'dod byed pa //
analyzed: yid kyi shing rtas 'dod byed pa //
translated: all that is desired by the mind's chariot

original: thams cad nges par thob par 'gyur //🔽mtshams med pa dang cha mthun gang //
analyzed: thams cad nges par thob par 'gyur // mtshams med pa dang cha mthun gang //
translated: will certainly be attained.🔽Whatever actions are similar to the heinous acts,

original: shin tu mi bzad las rnams ni //
analyzed: shin tu mi bzad las rnams ni //
translated: extremely unbearable,

original: de rnams thams cad mtshan bzang po //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad mtshan bzang po //
translated: all of those good qualities

original: rjes su dran las zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: rjes su dran las zad par 'gyur //
translated: will be exhausted through recollection.

original: yang na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: yang na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs //
translated: Or, with perfect discipline,🔽recollecting seven lifetimes,

original: skye ba bdun ni dran pa dang // dga' dang tshig btsun gzugs bzang ldan //🔽mthong dga' bram ze rgyal rigs kyi //
analyzed: skye ba bdun ni dran pa dang // dga' dang tshig btsun gzugs bzang ldan // mthong dga' bram ze rgyal rigs kyi //
translated: endowed with joy, pure speech, and a beautiful form,🔽one will be born into a pleasant-to-see brahmin or kṣatriya

original: rigs ni phyug por skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs ni phyug por skye bar 'gyur //
translated: wealthy family.

original: mthar ni sa yi dbang thob nas //
analyzed: mthar ni sa yi dbang thob nas //
translated: In the end, having attained lordship over the earth,

original: bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: one will go to Sukhāvatī.

original: ming brgya rtsa brgyad bklags pa yis //
analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad bklags pa yis //
translated: By reciting the one hundred and eight names,

original: lha mo myur du 'gugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha mo myur du 'gugs par 'gyur //
translated: the goddess will be quickly summoned.

original: 'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The one hundred and eight names of the noble Vasudharā are complete.
